snippet: At Stuyvesant High School, a prestigious New York public institution, a scandal involving the use of smartphones has left a blemish.
abstract: New York City school officials say 69 Stuyvesant High School students are involved in cheating scandal using a cellphone and will have to retake exams; a student whose phone was confiscated, who is said to be at the center of the cheating network, faces possible suspension and may have to transfer to another school by fall; revelation that Stuyvesant students cheated on tests not considered particularly challenging for them is the latest example of the competitive pressures inside top schools.
lead_paragraph: At Stuyvesant High School, a prestigious New York public institution, a scandal involving the use of smartphones has left a blemish.

headline.seo: 70 Students at Stuyvesant to Retake Exams After Cheating Case
headline.main: At Top School, Cheating Voids 70 Pupils’ Tests
headline.print_headline: At Top School, Cheating Voids 70 Pupils’ Tests
